wikipedia_page.main: James Callum Shaw (born 6 June 1996) is a British road racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team Ribble Weldtite. He previously rode for Belgian UCI WorldTeam Lotto–Soudal in 2017 and 2018, having come through their Under-23 team, SwiftCarbon Pro Cycling in 2019 and Riwal Securitas in 2020.
